Package model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Army
    Represents an Army used in a game but it is not completed yet
    AttackPlan  
    Card
    represents the card entity in the game
    CardDeck
    Represents deck of cards in the game
    Continent
    Continent class that holds all territories
    DataReader
    This class does the data read operations on the Map
    DataWriter
    This class do's all the write operations on the map that was loaded into memory
    Dice
    represents Dice
    GameManager
    This is the main game manager that controls the whole game
    GameResult  
    GpTest1
    Tests number of players with minPlayers - 1
    GpTest10
    testing attack logic
    GpTest11
    this class tests all strategies to make sure they are correct
    GpTest2
    Tests number of players with MaxPlayers + 1
    GpTest3
    Tests number of initial armies
    GpTest4
    Start game without a map
    GpTest5
    Players have used all their initial armies before playing
    GpTest6
    Tests minimum reinforcement armies
    GpTest7
    tests if a continent controls by a player
    GpTest8
    Tests moving all armies form a territory
    GpTest9
    testing card exchange logic with different trades
    Log
    Controller sending print messages to View View here is just a console
    Map
    represents the Map in the game in the form of ArrayList
    MapDataBase
    This class holds the all data related to the Map Whenever a .map file is read it is stored in this class memebers
    MapValidity
    This class has methods to check the valid of a map loaded into the memory
    Player
    This is player POJO Object
    SaveProcess
    This class converts the state of the game into a file and also deals with converting the saved game state file into model state such thet user can resume the game where he stopped previously.
    SaveProcessTest  
    Territory
    Territory POJO class
    Tournament  
    TournamentManager
    Tournament manager that manages the Tournament like adding the maps and starting the
